fixes.name: Delta Down All CCY 1Y CAD Diff
fixes.dax_expression: 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down All CCY 1Y CAD] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Date Sign]
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the row-level Tableau expression [Delta Down All CCY 1Y CAD]*[Date Sign] to a DAX calculated column. Comments were removed. Column references were transformed to the 'TableName'[ColumnName] format and multiplication preserved as-is. This is a row-level calculation (no aggregations or parameters), so it is a calculated column.
